00027 # define UMAIN()                                                \
00028                                                                 \
00029   int                                                           \
00030   main(int argc, const char** argv)                             \
00031   {                                                             \
00032     UrbiRoot urbi_root(argv[0], UMAIN_URBIROOT_STATIC);         \
00033     std::vector<std::string> args(argv, argv + argc);           \
00034     return urbi_root.urbi_main(args, true, true);               \
00035   }                                                             \
00036                                                                 \
00037   int                                                           \
00038   main_args(const libport::cli_args_type& args)                 \
00039   {                                                             \
00040     size_t argc = args.size();                                  \
00041     const char** argv = new const char*[argc];                  \
00042     for (unsigned i = 0; i < argc; ++i)                         \
00043       argv[i] = args[i].c_str();                                \
00044     int res = main(argc, argv);                                 \
00045     delete [] argv;                                             \
00046     return res;                                                 \
00047   }                                                             \
